org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.addresstracker

Class AddressTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.addresstracker.AddressTracker

  • public class AddressTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    AddressTracker manages the MD-SAL data tree for L2Address (mac, node connector pairings) information.
